definition[0]: the act of adding something to something else
example[0]: The addition of networking facilities will greatly enhance the system.

definition[1]: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it
example[2]: the latest addition to our designer range
example[3]: This excellent book will be a welcome addition to the library of any student.
definition[2]: the process of adding numbers or amounts to make a total
definition[3]: an extra room that is added to a building
example[4]: They built a big addition onto the back of the house.
